item.title: Bigger isn’t always better: Examining the business case for multi-million token LLMs
item.description: Are we unlocking new frontiers in AI reasoning, or simply stretching the limits of token memory without meaningful improvements?

item.title: Trump backs off on electronics tariffs
item.description: Reacting to continuing stock market woes and perhaps tech industry lobbyin, Trump backed off on tariffs for electronics late last night.

item.title: Now it’s TikTok parent ByteDance’s turn for a reasoning AI: enter Seed-Thinking-v1.5!
item.description: It achieved an 8.0% higher win rate over DeepSeek R1, suggesting that its strengths generalize beyond just logic or math-heavy challenges.

item.title: GamesBeat Summit 2025 speakers will help us navigate back to growth | The DeanBeat
item.description: Get ready. GamesBeat Summit 2025 will take place on May 19 to May 20 at the Marriott Marina del Rey in Los Angeles.

item.title: DeepCoder delivers top coding performance in efficient 14B open model
item.description: DeepCoder-14B competes with frontier models like o3 and o1—and the weights, code, and optimization platform are open source.
